body_html:
@andrewharp
I'm also having the same issue. but I'm retraining in Google compute engine on Ubuntu 14.04
for this command bazel build -c opt --copt=-mavx tensorflow/examples/image_retraining:retrain

 cannot create symbolic link bazel-genfiles -> /home/developersriharsha/.cache/bazel/_bazel_developersriharsha/622942cbf
9b89fb76bd82d9602a4d614/tensorflow/bazel-out/local_linux-opt/genfiles:  /home/developersriharsha/tensorflow/tensorflow/ba
zel-genfiles (Permission denied).

body:
@andrewharp
 I'm also having the same issue. but I'm retraining in Google compute engine on Ubuntu 14.04
for this command  `bazel build -c opt --copt=-mavx tensorflow/examples/image_retraining:retrain`

```
 cannot create symbolic link bazel-genfiles -> /home/developersriharsha/.cache/bazel/_bazel_developersriharsha/622942cbf
9b89fb76bd82d9602a4d614/tensorflow/bazel-out/local_linux-opt/genfiles:  /home/developersriharsha/tensorflow/tensorflow/ba
zel-genfiles (Permission denied).
```
